Delivery Portal CLI¶

Installation¶

How to install it.

code_api.dp_cli currently because in “wrong” directory. Need to adjust docs to be in cli directory.

Usage¶

code_api.dp_cli¶

code_api.dp_cli [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

get¶

Downloads the files from S3 bucket. Not usable by facilities.

code_api.dp_cli get [OPTIONS]

Options

-c, --config <config>¶

Path to config file containing e.g. username, password, project id, etc.

-u, --username <username>¶

Delivery Portal username.

-pw, --password <password>¶

Delivery Portal password.

-p, --project <project>¶

Project to upload files to.

-f, --pathfile <pathfile>¶

Path to file containing all files and folders to be uploaded.

-d, --data <data>¶

Path to file or folder to upload.

put¶

Uploads the files to S3 bucket. Only usable by facilities.

code_api.dp_cli put [OPTIONS]

Options

-c, --config <config>¶

Path to config file containing e.g. username, password, project id, etc.

-u, --username <username>¶

Delivery Portal username.

-pw, --password <password>¶

Delivery Portal password.

-p, --project <project>¶

Project to upload files to.

-f, --pathfile <pathfile>¶

Path to file containing all files and folders to be uploaded.

-d, --data <data>¶

Path to file or folder to upload.

Contents¶

Main¶

Command line interface for Data Delivery Portal

class dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.ECDHKeyPair(privatekey: str = 'key', publickey: str = 'key', temp_dir: str = '')¶

Public key pair. Algorithm: Eliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (Curve25519)

encrypt(file: str, remote_pubkey, temp_dir: str, sub_dir: str)¶

Uses the remote public key and the own private key to encrypt a file

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.all_data(data_tuple: tuple, data_file: str)¶

Puts all data from tuple and file into one tuple

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.check_access(login_info: dict) → str¶

Checks the users access to the delivery portal and the specified project, and the projects S3 access.

Parameters

login_info – Dictionary containing username, password and project ID.

Returns

User ID connected to the specified user.

Return type

str

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.compress_chunk(original_chunk)¶

Compress individual chunks read in a streamed fashion

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.compression_dict()¶

Returns a list of compressed-format mime types

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.couch_connect() → couchdb.client.Server¶

Connects to a couchdb interface. Currently hard-coded.

Returns

CouchDB server instance.

Return type

couchdb.client.Server

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.couch_disconnect(couch, token)¶

Disconnect from couchdb interface.

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.decompress_chunk(compressed_chunk)¶

Performs gzip compression and streams compressed chunk

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.dp_access(username: str, password: str, upload: bool) -> (<class 'bool'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Check existance of user in database and the password validity.

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.file_type(fpath: str) → str¶

Guesses file mime based on extension

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.gen_hmac(filepath: str, chunk_size: int, hash_) → str¶

Generates HMAC for file

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.generate_header(own_private_key, remote_public_key)¶

Generates crypt4gh format header

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.get_current_time() → str¶

Gets the current time and formats for database.

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.get_filesize(filename: str) → int¶

Returns file size

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.get_passphrase()¶

Gets passphrase for private key encryption

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.hash_compress_hash(file: str, compressed_file: str, hash_original, hash_compressed) -> (<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'str'>)¶

hash + compress + hash

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.hash_compress_hash_encrypt_hash(file: str, encrypted_file: str, keypair, hash_original, hash_compressed, hash_encrypted) -> (<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'str'>)¶

hash + compress + hash + encrypt + hash

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.hash_dir(dir_path: str, key) → str¶

Generates a hash for all contents within a folder

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.hash_encrypt_hash(file: str, encrypted_file: str, keypair, hash_compressed, hash_encrypted) -> (<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'str'>)¶

hash + encrypt + hash

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.new_dir(filename: str, sub_dir: str, temp_dir: str, operation: str) → str¶

Checks which dir to place file in

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.ngs_type(extension: str)¶

Checks if the file is of ngs type

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.process_file(file: str, temp_dir: str, sub_dir: str = '', sensitive: bool = True) → dict¶

Handles file specific compression, hashing and encryption

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.process_folder(folder: str, temp_dir: str, sub_dir: str = '', sensitive: bool = True)¶

Handles folder specific compression, hashing, and encryption

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.project_access(user: str, project: str) → bool¶

Checks the users access to a specific project.

Parameters

  • user – User ID.

  • project – ID of project that the user is requiring access to.

Returns

Return type

bool

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.secure_password_hash(password_settings: str, password_entered: str) → str¶

Generates secure password hash.

Parameters

  • password_settings – String containing the salt, length of hash, n-exponential, r and p variables. Taken from database. Separated by ‘$’.

  • password_entered – The user-specified password.

Returns

The derived hash from the user-specified password.

Return type

str

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.stream_chunks(file_handle, chunk_size)¶

Reads file and returns (streams) the content in chunks

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.try_decryption(encrypted_file: str, keypair: tuple)¶

Tests decryption of encrypted c4gh file

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.validate_api_options(config: str, username: str, password: str, project: str, pathfile: str, data: tuple) -> (<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Checks if all required options are entered etc.

dp_api.code_api.dp_cli.verify_user_credentials(config: str, username: str, password: str, project: str) -> (<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Checks that the correct options and credentials are entered.

Parameters

  • config – File containing the users DP username and password, and the project relating to the upload/download. Can be used instead of inputing the credentials separately.

  • username – Username for DP log in.

  • password – Password connected to username.

  • project – Project ID.

Returns

A tuple containing three strings

Username (str)

Password (str)

Project ID (str)

Return type

tuple

Exceptions¶

Exceptions

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.AuthenticationError(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors regarding delivery portal authentications.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.CompressionError(msg: str)¶

Errors related to compression operations.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.CouchDBException(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors in database operations.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.DataException(msg: str)¶

Errors related to the data entered as an option

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.DeliveryOptionException(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors regarding data delivery options (s3 delivery) etc.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.DeliveryPortalException(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors regarding Delivery Portal access etc

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.EncryptionError(msg: str)¶

Handles errors regarding data encryption.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.HashException(msg: str)¶

Handles errors regarding checksum generation.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.SecurePasswordException(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors regarding password retrieval and handling.

exception dp_api.code_api.dp_exceptions.StreamingError(msg: str)¶

Custom exception class. Handles errors regarding streaming file contents.
